name: Phố cổ Hội An
description: Hoi An Ancient Town is a UNESCO World Heritage site known for its well-preserved architecture and rich cultural heritage.

name: Chùa Cầu
address: Chùa Cầu, Hội An, Quảng Nam, Vietnam
description: Chùa Cầu (Japanese Bridge) is an iconic structure in Hoi An, blending Japanese and Vietnamese architecture.

name: Hội quán Phúc Kiến
address: Hội quán Phúc Kiến, Hội An, Quảng Nam, Vietnam
description: The Phuc Kien Assembly Hall is a Chinese temple with intricate architecture, dedicated to the goddess of the sea.

address: Nhà cổ Tấn Ký, Hội An, Quảng Nam, Vietnam

name: Sông Hoài
